Package it.polimi.model

Class Bookshelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.model.Bookshelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bookshelf extends Object implements Serializable
The bookshelf class represents personal bookshelf of each player
Author:
Christian Piccoli, Lorenzo Pittelli, Nicola Siniscalchi

    • setMaxDrawableObjects

      public void setMaxDrawableObjects(int maxDrawableObjects)
      Sets the max amount of drawable objects from the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      maxDrawableObjects - the amount of objects that can be picked up from the LivingRoomBoard

      Returns:
      the amount of objects that can be picked up from the LivingRoomBoard

      Returns:
      the array containing all the tiles

      Parameters:
      card - the card picked

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if maxDrawableObjects equals 0, meaning there are no empty spots in the bookshelf
      Returns:
      true if the bookshelf is full, else false

      column - the chosen column

    • showBookshelf

      public String showBookshelf(int row)
      Displays the chosen row of the bookshelf as a string in terminal (used in TUI)
      Parameters:
      row - chosen row
      Returns:
      visual representation of the row as a string

    • updateMaxDrawableObjects

      public void updateMaxDrawableObjects()
      Checks how many free spots are left in the bookshelf and updates maxDrawableObject attribute
